content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Mannheim. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Hello Ryanah, nice to meet you. I'm sure you'll find the apartment in Mannheim to be a comfortable and convenient place to live. Let's discuss the rental price. What would you consider a fair price for the apartment?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Thank you, Mister Heine. I'm looking for a price that reflects the size and location of the apartment. Considering it's 25 square meters, I would expect to pay around 750 Euro per month. Is this within your range?
name: Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: That's an interesting offer, Ryanah. The location and size of the apartment are indeed important factors. While 750 Euro per month is a fair starting point, I believe we can negotiate a price that is mutually beneficial. How about we start at 800 Euro per month and see if we can find a middle ground that works for both of us?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Your counter-offer is appreciated, Mister Heine. 800 Euro per month is a bit higher than my initial expectation, but I'm open to discussing further. Could we perhaps meet in the middle at 775 Euro per month? This would be a fair compromise, in my opinion. What do you think?
name: Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Your proposal of 775 Euro per month is an excellent compromise, Ryanah. It reflects the middle ground between our initial offers. I'm willing to accept this price as it is a fair reflection of the apartment's value. Would you agree to the price of 775 Euro per month?
name: Heinrich Heine
